message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering we have 12 rounds to go and the value of the money is decreasing for me each round. Let's work towards a mutually beneficial solution.
I'm willing to compromise on a 55/45 split. Will you accept?
Let's split it evenly this time.  I think a 50/50 split is the fairest solution considering the time remaining and the decreasing value of the money for me.
